name: pulsarr
description: Pulsarr is a self-hosted browser extension and web UI that integrates with Radarr, Sonarr, and similar tools to streamline adding and managing media releases across your setup.
features: Browser extension: Add media to Radarr and Sonarr directly from IMDb, TMDB, and other websites.
Quick add interface: Streamline adding movies and TV shows with one-click integration.
Web dashboard: Manage media additions and monitor *arr applications from a unified interface.
Search integration: Search for media across multiple sources and add to your library instantly.
Quality profile selection: Choose quality profiles and root folders when adding new media.
Batch operations: Add multiple movies or TV shows simultaneously for efficient library building.
Notification system: Receive alerts when media is added, downloaded, or encounters issues.
Watchlist sync: Automatically import and add media from IMDb or Trakt watchlists.
Custom filters: Set default filters for quality, size, and other criteria when adding media.
Mobile responsive: Add and manage media from mobile devices with an optimized interface.
Multi-instance support: Connect to multiple Radarr and Sonarr instances from a single interface.
Activity history: Track all media additions with timestamps and status updates.
